description:
This  super moon I took the chance to try out something new. I have seen a lot of very nice moon pics in internet in 3D technique......and to be honest, I loved them. Even they appear  somehow a little artificial, I was fascinated by the 3D look in which they appear. I read a little about how to produce them and this here is my first try.  When artificial, then with full range I thought by myself and decided for an lightly oversaturated color pic. The main idea of this 3D moon  imaging is to combine a full moon shot with partial moon shot to produce this effect. This was the most difficult part, because of course they will not fit together correctly and a lot of retouche is necessary. For this pic I took:
one partial moon shot
one full moon shot
three color full moon shots in RGB
one full holiday to fiddle this nonsens together.
I really don't like pink very much, so my color version looks more greenish.
Hope you like that and of course a big excuse to the real moon photographers in this forum here
CS, Christoph
title: Colored super moon 2020 in 3D technique
